DOC.brief_summary: Demographic information brief medical concomitant medicine history obtain glaucoma patient 's record . Qualified patient ask complete questionnaire symptom . Patients schedule undergo three standard clinical test ocular surface .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Ocular Surface Disease Glaucoma Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis glaucoma ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Inability understand trial procedure ; Inability understand Informed Consent ; Current use use within last 3 month Restasis , steroid , topical ocular nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ; Punctal plug ; Previous glaucoma , corneal , conjunctival surgery ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
